panels.description: total number of transactions in mempool
panels.title: Mempool size

panels.description: rate of mempool insertion of txn
panels.title: Successful Txn Insertion Rate

panels.description: Rate at which txns are removed (via commit) from mempool
panels.title: Txn Removal Rate

panels.description: number of live peers a node can broadcast to in each network
panels.title: Active Upstream Peers

panels.description: rate of submitted txns that failed to pass the VM validation
panels.title: VM Failed Txns Rate

panels.description: number of timeouts on a mempool service request (from consensus/state sync)
panels.title: Mempool Service Timeout

panels.description: number of times a DB error occurred
panels.title: DB error

panels.description: number of timeouts in callback to JSON RPC
panels.title: JSON RPC Callback Timeout

panels.description: number of times a diem network send failed
panels.title: Network Send Fail

panels.description: number of times reconfiguration of VM failed
panels.title: VM Reconfiguration Failure

panels.description: number of times core mempool invariant was violated
panels.title: Core Mempool Invariant Violation

panels.description: rate of unexpected network messages received
panels.title: Unexpected Network Messages

panels.description: rate of number of transactions that expired in mempool based on client-specified expiration time
panels.title: Client-expired txns

panels.description: Rate of number of transactions that expired in mempool based on mempool-specified expiration time
panels.title: System-expired Txns

panels.description: number of transactions in parking lot index. These transactions are not ready for broadcast or consensus
panels.title: Parking Lot Index

panels.description: number of transactions ready for broadcast in core mempool
panels.title: Timeline Index

panels.description: transactions ready for consensus
panels.title: Priority Index

panels.description: rate of transactions that passed VM validation but were rejected from mempool
panels.title: Failed Mempool Insertion Rate

panels.description: Number of times garbage-collection event occurred (regardless of how many txns were actually removed in the event)
panels.title: Garbage Collection Event Rate

panels.description: how long a transaction stayed in mempool before being garbage-collected
panels.title: GC Latency

panels.description: Rate of accepted transactions committed per second (notified from state sync)
panels.title: Accepted Transaction Commit Rate

panels.description: average time it takes for mempool to process a commit of accepted transactions (sent from state sync)
panels.title: Avg latency for commit (accepted)

panels.description: rate of rejected committed transactions (notified from consensus)
panels.title: Rejected Transaction Commit Rate

panels.description: avg time it takes to process committed rejected txns
panels.title: Avg time of commit (rejected txns)

panels.description: Average size of consensus blocks pulled from mempool
panels.title: Block size

panels.description: Avg time it takes for consensus to pull block from mempool
panels.title: Avg latency for get_block

panels.description: rate of shared mempool events from peers
panels.title: Incoming events rate

panels.description: average time it takes for mempool to start an async task
panels.title: Shared Mempool Task Start Latency

panels.description: rate of new transactions received from other peers or JSON-RPC
panels.title: New transactions received rate

panels.description: rate of transactions that were successfully validated before mempool insertion
panels.title: Successful transaction validation rate

panels.description: avg time it takes to process incoming transactions, per incoming submission
panels.title: Average Txn Processing Latency

panels.description: avg time it takes to VM-validate txns in a submission
panels.title: Average VM Validation Latency

panels.description: latency of db read when validating transaction
panels.title: Average DB Read Latency

panels.description: average number of transactions in a single broadcast
panels.title: Average Broadcast Size

panels.description: rate of transactions broadcasted to other peers
panels.title: Broadcasted Txns Rate

panels.description: avg number of broadcasts / sec
panels.title: Broadcast Rate

panels.description: avg time it takes to execute a broadcast
panels.title: Average Broadcast Execution Latency

panels.description: average time b/w broadcast sent and ACK coming back for it
panels.title: Average Broadcast Roundtrip Time

panels.description: number of sent broadcasts awaiting an ACK
panels.title: Pending Broadcasts

panels.description: rate of broadcasts that are retrying expired braodcasts (that did not get back an ACK in window of time)
panels.title: Expired Rebroadcast Rate

panels.description: rate of broadcasts that are retrying past broadcasts that received a retry ACK
panels.title: Retry Rebroadcast

panels.description: rate of broadcasts that were executed as a backpressure broadcast
panels.title: Backpressure Broadcast

panels.description: rate of backoff/retry ACKs sent
panels.title: Sent ACKs (backoff/retry)

panels.description: rate of retry/backpressure ACKs received
panels.title: ACKs Received

panels.description: number of messages dropped from mempool channel sender
panels.title: Dropped Messages

panels.description: rate of messages being enqueued to be sent out
panels.title: Messages Enqueued Rate

panels.description: Rate of messages dequeued from mempool network sender
panels.title: Messages Dequeued Rate

panels.description: Messages currently queued to be sent out

targets.expr: sum by (job) (mempool_pending_network_events{state="enqueued", job=~"$job"}) - sum by (job)  (mempool_pending_network_events{state="dequeued", job=~"$job"})

panels.title: Messages Queued
